sys_element_mapping.value:
XLR Pre University College

 

Dear: Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Father Name,

 

As the college result are announced, your son Trigger➛...➛Student Name,

got Percentage: Trigger➛...➛Percentage and result isTrigger➛...➛Result.

 

To Check the Result of you son/daughter click the link below, result

 

 

To discuss further regarding your child performance conducting a parents teacher meeting on Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Meeting,

Please attend the meeting without fail

 

From:

KLR Pre University College 

Principal

Banglore

560069
